verses.verse: How<WH351> lonely<WH910> sits<WH3427> the city<WH5892> That was full<WH7227> of people!<WH5971> She has become<WH1961> like a widow<WH490> Who<WH7227> was [once] great<WH7227> among the nations!<WH1471> She who was a princess<WH8282> among the provinces<WH4082> Has become<WH1961> a forced<WH4522> laborer!<WH4522>

She weeps<WH1058> bitterly<WH1058> in the night,<WH3915> And her tears<WH1832> are on her cheeks;<WH3895> She has<WH369> none<WH369> to comfort<WH5162> her Among<WH4480> all<WH3605> her lovers.<WH157> All<WH3605> her friends<WH7453> have dealt<WH898> treacherously<WH898> with her; They have become<WH1961> her enemies.<WH340>

Judah<WH3063> has gone<WH1540> into exile<WH1540> under<WH4480> affliction,<WH6040> And under<WH4480> harsh<WH7230> servitude;<WH5656> She dwells<WH3427> among the nations,<WH1471> [But] she has found<WH4672> no<WH3808> rest;<WH4494> All<WH3605> her pursuers<WH7291> have overtaken<WH5381> her In the midst<WH996> of distress.<WH4712>

The roads<WH1870> of Zion<WH6726> are in mourning<WH57> Because<WH4480> <WH1097> no<WH1097> one comes<WH935> to the appointed<WH4150> feasts.<WH4150> All<WH3605> her gates<WH8179> are desolate;<WH8074> Her priests<WH3548> are groaning,<WH584> Her virgins<WH1330> are afflicted,<WH3013> And she herself<WH1931> is bitter.<WH4843>

Her adversaries<WH6862> have become<WH1961> her masters,<WH7218> Her enemies<WH340> prosper;<WH7951> For the Lord<WH3068> has caused<WH3013> her grief<WH3013> Because<WH5921> of the multitude<WH7230> of her transgressions;<WH6588> Her little<WH5768> ones<WH5768> have gone<WH1980> away As captives<WH7628> before<WH6440> the adversary.<WH6862>

And all<WH3605> her majesty<WH1926> Has departed<WH3318> from the daughter<WH1323> of Zion;<WH6726> Her princes<WH8269> have become<WH1961> like bucks<WH354> That have found<WH4672> no<WH3808> pasture;<WH4829> And they have fled<WH1980> without<WH3808> strength<WH3581> Before<WH6440> the pursuer.<WH7291>

In the days<WH3117> of her affliction<WH6040> and homelessness<WH4788> Jerusalem<WH3389> remembers<WH2142> all<WH3605> her precious<WH4262> things<WH4262> That were from the days<WH3117> of old<WH6924> When her people<WH5971> fell<WH5307> into the hand<WH3027> of the adversary,<WH6862> And no<WH369> one<WH369> helped<WH5826> her. The adversaries<WH6862> saw<WH7200> her, They mocked<WH7832> at her ruin.<WH4868>

Jerusalem<WH3389> sinned<WH2398> greatly,<WH2399> Therefore<WH5921> <WH3651> she has become<WH1961> an unclean<WH5206> thing.<WH5206> All<WH3605> who honored<WH3513> her despise<WH9105> her Because<WH3588> they have seen<WH7200> her nakedness;<WH6172> Even<WH1571> she herself<WH1931> groans<WH584> and turns<WH7725> away.<WH268>

Her uncleanness<WH2932> was in her skirts;<WH7757> She did not consider<WH2142> her future;<WH319> Therefore she has fallen<WH3381> astonishingly;<WH6382> She has<WH369> no<WH369> comforter.<WH5162> "See,<WH7200> O Lord,<WH3068> my affliction,<WH6040> For the enemy<WH340> has magnified<WH1431> himself!"

The adversary<WH6862> has stretched<WH6566> out his hand<WH3027> Over<WH5921> all<WH3605> her precious<WH4261> things,<WH4261> For she has seen<WH7200> the nations<WH1471> enter<WH935> her sanctuary,<WH4720> The ones whom<WH834> Thou didst command<WH6680> That they should not enter<WH935> into Thy congregation.<WH6951>

All<WH3605> her people<WH5971> groan<WH584> seeking<WH1245> bread;<WH3899> They have given<WH5414> their precious<WH4262> things<WH4262> for food<WH400> To restore<WH7725> their lives<WH5315> themselves. "See,<WH7200> O Lord,<WH3068> and look,<WH5027> For I am<WH1961> despised.<WH9105>"

"Is it nothing<WH3808> to all<WH3605> you who pass<WH5674> this way<WH1870>? Look<WH5027> and see<WH7200> if<WH518> there<WH3426> is any<WH3426> pain<WH4341> like my pain<WH4341> Which<WH834> was severely<WH9412> dealt<WH9412> out to me, Which<WH834> the Lord<WH3068> inflicted<WH3013> on the day<WH3117> of His fierce<WH2740> anger.<WH639>

"From on high<WH4791> He sent<WH7971> fire<WH784> into my bones,<WH6106> And it prevailed<WH7287> [over them;] He has spread<WH6566> a net<WH7568> for my feet;<WH7272> He has turned<WH7725> me back;<WH268> He has made<WH5414> me desolate,<WH8074> Faint<WH1739> all<WH3605> day<WH3117> long.

"The yoke<WH5923> of my transgressions<WH6588> is bound;<WH8244> By His hand<WH3027> they are knit<WH8276> together;<WH8276> They have come<WH5927> upon my neck;<WH6677> He has made my strength<WH3581> fail;<WH3782> The Lord<WH136> has given<WH5414> me into the hands<WH3027> Of [those against whom] I am not able<WH3201> to stand.<WH6965>

"The Lord<WH136> has rejected<WH9364> all<WH3605> my strong<WH47> men<WH47> In my midst;<WH7130> He has called<WH7121> an appointed<WH4150> time<WH4150> against<WH5921> me To crush<WH7665> my young<WH970> men;<WH970> The Lord<WH136> has trodden<WH1869> [as in] a wine<WH1660> press<WH1660> The virgin<WH1330> daughter<WH1323> of Judah.<WH3063>

"For these<WH428> things<WH428> I weep;<WH1058> My eyes<WH5869> run<WH3381> down<WH3381> with water;<WH4325> Because<WH3588> far<WH7368> from me is a comforter,<WH5162> One who restores<WH7725> my soul;<WH5315> My children<WH1121> are desolate<WH8074> Because<WH3588> the enemy<WH340> has prevailed.<WH1396>"

Zion<WH6726> stretches<WH6566> out her hands;<WH3027> There<WH369> is no<WH369> one<WH369> to comfort<WH5162> her; The Lord<WH3068> has commanded<WH6680> concerning Jacob<WH3290> That the ones round<WH5439> about<WH5439> him should be his adversaries;<WH6862> Jerusalem<WH3389> has become<WH1961> an unclean<WH5079> thing<WH5079> among<WH996> them.

"The Lord<WH3068> is righteous;<WH6662> For I have rebelled<WH4784> against<WH854> His command;<WH6310> Hear<WH8085> now,<WH4994> all<WH3605> peoples,<WH5971> And behold<WH7200> my pain;<WH4341> My virgins<WH1330> and my young<WH970> men<WH970> Have gone<WH1980> into captivity.<WH7628>

"I called<WH7121> to my lovers,<WH157> [but] they deceived<WH7411> me; My priests<WH3548> and my elders<WH2205> perished<WH1478> in the city,<WH5892> While<WH3588> they sought<WH1245> food<WH400> to restore<WH7725> their strength<WH5315> themselves.

"See,<WH7200> O Lord,<WH3068> for I am in distress;<WH9503> My spirit<WH4578> is greatly<WH2560> troubled;<WH2560> My heart<WH3820> is overturned<WH2015> within<WH7130> me, For I have been very<WH4784> rebellious.<WH4784> In the street<WH2351> the sword<WH2719> slays;<WH7921> In the house<WH1004> it is like death.<WH4194>

"They have heard<WH8085> that I groan;<WH584> There<WH369> is no<WH369> one<WH369> to comfort<WH5162> me; All<WH3605> my enemies<WH340> have heard<WH8085> of my calamity;<WH9567> They are glad<WH7797> that Thou hast done<WH6213> [it.] Oh, that Thou wouldst bring<WH935> the day<WH3117> which Thou hast proclaimed,<WH7121> That they may become<WH1961> like<WH3644> me.

"Let all<WH3605> their wickedness<WH9567> come<WH935> before<WH6440> Thee; And deal<WH9412> with them as Thou hast dealt<WH9412> with me For all<WH3605> my transgressions;<WH6588> For my groans<WH585> are many,<WH7227> and my heart<WH3820> is faint.<WH1742>"
